text: Saint-Martin-sur-Ocre is a former commune. It is found in the Yonne department in the center of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Le Val-d'Ocre.Arrêté préfectoral 8 December 2015 ==References== Category:Former communes in Yonne
title: Saint-Martin-sur-Ocre, Yonne
